short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing OpinionTrade, the plugin that simplifies the exchange of investment news. Share investment news articles from yourâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing OpinionTrade, the plugin that simplifies the exchange of investment news. Share investment news articles from your favorite sites directly with friends and family, just like you would on Facebook, LinkedIn, or Twitter. Click on the OpinionTrade icon next to other share buttons, and you'll be redirected to web.opiniontrade.ai with the article ready to share. It's simple, quick, and super handy.

Key Features:

Easy sharing of investment news from popular sites.
Seamless integration with existing share buttons.
Quick redirection to Opiniontrade.ai for sharing.

Supported Sites:

Benzinga (https://www.benzinga.com)
MotleyFool (https://www.fool.com)
SeekingAlpha (https://seekingalpha.com)
MarketWatch (https://www.marketwatch.com)
Investors (https://www.investors.com)
CNN (https://www.cnn.com)
Bloomberg (https://www.bloomberg.com)
BusinessInsider (https://www.businessinsider.com)
Yahoo Finance (https://finance.yahoo.com)
CNBC (https://www.cnbc.com)
StreetInsider (https://www.streetinsider.com)
Nasdaq (https://www.nasdaq.com)
Investopedia (https://www.investopedia.com)
Barrons (https://www.barrons.com)
MorningStar (https://www.morningstar.com)
StockNews (https://stocknews.com)
MarketBeat (https://www.marketbeat.com)
InvestorPlace (https://investorplace.com)
Kiplinger (https://www.kiplinger.com)
MarketRealist (https://marketrealist.com)
Thecerbatgem (https://www.thecerbatgem.com)



Example Usage:
Visit a news article on a supported site, such as an article at https://www.benzinga.com/insights/news/24/11/41755643/100-invested-in-this-stock-15-years-ago-would-be-worth-2-100-today on Benzinga. Within 1 to 3 seconds, the OpinionTrade icon will appear alongside the share buttons for LinkedIn and Twitter. Click on the OpinionTrade icon to share on OpinionTrade.ai.

Get OpinionTrade now and start sharing the investment news that matters in a snap!

For questions or feedback, please contact us at contact@opiniontrade.ai
